item.title: üêç How To Query PostgreSQL in AWS RDS with Python
item.description: In this post I’ll walk through: how to create a public PostgreSQL instance in RDS using free-tier how to create a table and load it with data from a csv file how to query data from that table using psycopg2 RDS The only thing you have to do in the AWS console is create a Postgres DB instance and make sure it is open to the public (just for this example).
